Reviews.Content: This Hotel is Full of THIEVES !!! This hotel is full of thieves.Never ever stay at this hotel. At this hotel my luggage includingmy passport, 2 laptops and other important documents are stolen.I am [-] sure that the Hotel Management is involved in this.MY ADVICE IS THAT NEVER EVER STAY AT THIS HOTEL.IF YOU STAY THERE THEN STAY AT YOUR OWN RISK.IF YOU DO NOT BELIEVE ME THEN CALL TO THE POLICE STATION WHICH IS NEAREST TO THIS HOTEL.THEY WILL TELL YOU THEMSELVES.i do not want any other person to suffer the same as i did.So please rethink about your decision before going to thishotel.
Reviews.Author: Smith_rojer

Reviews.Content: Ich hatte bei 55,- pro Nacht...   showReview(11345686, 'full');
